mapper.select: SELECT CODE_ID, CODE_NAME FROM COMMONCODE WHERE CODE = 'TASK_CODE'
SELECT CODE_ID, CODE_NAME FROM COMMONCODE WHERE CODE = 'APP_CODE'
SELECT ACCT_ID ,B.BANK_NAME||' '||ACCT_NO || ' | ' ||ACCT_COMENT "ACCT_COMENT" FROM ACCOUNT A LEFT OUTER JOIN BANK B ON(A.BANK_CODE=B.BANK_CODE) WHERE SUBSTR(ACCT_ID, 1, 5) = #{aptCode}

SELECT A.MEM_ID ,EMP_NAME ,POSITION_NAME ,B.POSITION_CODE FROM EMPLOYEE A LEFT OUTER JOIN POSITION B ON(A.POSITION_CODE=B.POSITION_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER C ON(A.MEM_ID=C.MEM_ID) WHERE A.APT_CODE=#{aptCode} AND (B.POSITION_CODE='E001' OR B.POSITION_CODE='E002') AND NOT A.MEM_ID = #{memId} AND A.EMP_END IS NULL ORDER BY B.POSITION_CODE ASC
SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT MIN(APPLINEDE_ID) APPLINEDE_ID ,MEM_ID FROM LINEDETAIL WHERE APPLINE_ID=#{applineId} GROUP BY MEM_ID ORDER BY APPLINEDE_ID) A WHERE ROWNUM=1
